## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### Binary Downloads
Download the appropriate binary for your platform from the assets below.

### Build from Source
```bash
git clone https://github.com/harpertoken/llamaware.git
cd llamaware
cmake -S . -B build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release
cmake --build build --config Release
```
